categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Maiya Vix was a female Human who served in the Imperial Army as part of the Dread Executioners strike force under Lord Hargrev. She assisted Hargrev and the Imperial forces during the Dread War on Oricon.
Maiya Vix is a character in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, voiced by Lydia Leonard. She appears during the Imperial world arc on Oricon, released with game update 2.4 in 2013.
